articles.title: ‘Silicon Six’ accused of avoiding almost $278bn in US corporation taxes over 10 years
articles.description: Analysis finds Amazon, Meta, Alphabet, Netflix, Apple and Microsoft averaged 18.8%, compared with 29.7% US average
articles.content:
The big American tech firms known as the “Silicon Six” have been accused of paying almost $278bn (£211bn) less corporate income tax in the past decade compared with the statutory rate for US companies making the same profits.

articles.title: Japan regulator orders Google to stop anticompetitive practices
articles.description: Japan’s antitrust regulator instructed Alphabet’s Google to stop what it said are anticompetitive practices involving mobile search services, its first order against a U.S. technology giant.
articles.content:
Japan’s antitrust regulator instructed Alphabet’s Google to stop what it said are anticompetitive practices involving mobile search services, its first order against a U.S. technology giant.

articles.title: Google cuts 'hundreds' of jobs in Android, Chrome division: report
articles.description: Google parent Alphabet has reportedly slashed hundreds of jobs in the division responsible for Android and its Chrome web browser as part of its latest restructuring.
articles.content:
Google parent Alphabet reportedly slashed hundreds of jobs in the division responsible for Android and its Chrome web browser as part of its latest restructuring.
